dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Are you here to join the hunt for that bastard as well? Or are you merely here to... take in this desolation?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Close the window, will you? I had the misfortune of being born in a body that goes into coughing fits at the slightest breeze.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Don't expect to see the sun anytime soon as long as you are here. It hides forevermore beyond the overcast sky. It is as distant as the notion of peace is to us.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The rushing gale wakes me from my already shallow sleep. Perhaps my nightmares have returned from oblivion to rap at my windows again.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Ah, it's you. A... rather disagreeable guest visits me from time to time. Though I have made an alliance with him as I had no alternative... I know that he is always ready to stab me in the back.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: A sharper blade leads to a sharper mind? It's a load of crap. My blade is sharper than anything... because I paid good money for it. But... every night... every time I stir awake, I am trapped in a world of endless doubt... wondering if all this had been nothing but a terrible nightmare.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Have you seen that manor yourself? That desolate place visited only by the wuthering winds and lightning. It inspires nothing but despair... which is, ironically, what keeps me going.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Sometimes, when I see a gravestone without a name... my heart begins racing like it's about to explode. Now... do you know why that may be?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: That bastard deliberately cut off only one of my arms. I didn't escape; I was let go. He tells me that we should partake in a game of hide-and-seek that we could not as children. We will see who hunts who in the end.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Don't worry. I'm used to being forgotten.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Yes... it's about time I sharpened the blade of my sword.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Have we found our prey?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: This is the time for lamentation.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Have you something to say to me?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: I dedicate this blade to you.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: I hope you weren't expecting to find honor in this battle.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: If I were to fall here... he would... mock me so savagely.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: I have struck but one of your vital points...

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah, the mist fades... I can finally see the face of the one I so longed to see in my dreams...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Compared to what I have cut down in my path, this was... easy.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: It slipped my sight.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: The final battle lies beyond still. There is hardly any time to celebrate.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Let this blade find its way into his black heart.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It was simply not the time.
